name: Berserker
flavor: You find yourself in the front lines, striking with fury and little regard to your own defense.

techniques.name: Pursuit
techniques.desc: You chase a foe as they attempt to flee, dedicated to keeping them within your reach.
techniques.trigger: An enemy within your Reach moves outside your Reach.
techniques.cost: 1 _Reflex_, 1 _Momentum_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
techniques.effect: At the end of that creature's turn, immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_. You must use any _Movement_ granted by the chosen _Technique_ to move towards the enemy, ending this Reaction as close to them as possible. If you are adjacent to the target, make the Attack with _Advantage_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.

name: Brawler
flavor: Your fighting style is wild and unpredictable, using the environment itself as often as your weapons.

techniques.name: Improvised Strike
techniques.desc: Any item can be a weapon, a simple fact you make use of for this strike.
techniques.effect: Immediately make an Attack using the Profile of an adjacent or Equipped Improvised Weapon. You may always make this attack using a Small Improvised Weapon by making use of rocks, sticks, and other small items that aren't shown on the map. Gain 1 _Momentum_ on a _Hit_ or Crit.
techniques.special: You do not have _Disadvantage_ when making _Thrown_ attacks with Improvised Weapons.

name: Gladiator
flavor: You practice a flashy, energetic combat style that energizes your allies and demoralizes your foes.

stances.name: Spectacle Style
stances.desc: You always defeat your foes with a flourish, encouraging allies while terrifying foes.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you defeat a creature gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: You may take two Reactions on your own Turn, so long as at least one has the trigger 'You defeat a creature'.

techniques.name: Stay Down!
techniques.desc: You lash out at foe, attempting to force them to stay on the ground where they belong.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Target isn't Prone, this Attack has Disadvantage. Otherwise, deal an additional 2 Damage and inflict either _Grief_ 1 (1 _Focus_) or _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

techniques.name: Butcher
techniques.desc: You defeat a foe in a brutal fashion, striking fear into the heart of your foes.
techniques.effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Fear_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on them.

techniques.name: Warcry
techniques.desc: You let out a triumphant shout as you defeat a foe, bolstering an ally's spirit.
techniques.effect: Choose an ally within Range. They gain _Courage_ 2.

techniques.name: Taunt
techniques.desc: You issue a challenge to a foe, forcing them to focus on you.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Rage_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on a creature within Range.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum: Instead, Range is Self and Area is Burst 2. Inflict the Effect on all creatures of your choice within Range.

name: Scoundrel
flavor: You fight dirty, relying on clever tricks and cheap shots to carry you to victory.

techniques.name: Nimble Feint
techniques.desc: You cunningly feign an attack to create an opening for yourself.
techniques.reqs: Must be Attached to a Single Target Strike.
techniques.effect: The Target of the Attached Strike must _Negate_ with 2 _Focus_, otherwise you gain _Advantage_ on the Attached Strike and deal an additional 2 Damage.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: After resolving the Attached Strike, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Skulker
flavor: You mostly fight from the shadows, making the most of every opportunity provided to you.

name: Warlord
flavor: You lead your companions from the front, create opportunities for them to strike and rallying them to your side.

techniques.name: Rally
techniques.desc: You let out a rallying cry, calling your allies to you.
techniques.effect: All allies in the Area may immediately take a Step Movement towards you by the the shortest possible route.

name: Weapon Master
flavor: You change weapons faster than most can blink, always keeping the one at hand to provide the greatest benefit.
